month.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: one of the 12 named periods of time that a year is divided into
month.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: I hope I’ll have finished the work by the end of the month.
She earns about £350 a month (=each month).
We update the schedule at least once a month.
Phil is coming home for a visit next month.
It snowed heavily during the month of January.
month.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a period of about four weeks
month.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: He’ll be away for two months.
The symptoms she suffered varied from month to month (=every few weeks she had different medical problems).
month.translation[0].note_box[0].section: last month
The new restaurant opened last month.
the past month
They had come to know and like each other in the past month.
the previous/preceding month
Sales were lower than in the previous month.
next month
The movie will be released next month.
the coming months
Further work is planned for the coming months.
the following month
By the following month he had raised over £400.
the summer/autumn/winter/spring months
It’s very cold here during the winter months.
a calendar month
We get paid on the last day of the calendar month.
in recent months
He had started to drink heavily in recent months.
the beginning/end/middle of the month
You’ll receive your wages at the end of the month.
the time of the month
This is the busiest time of the month.
the months of the year
We’re learning the months of the year in German.
a month passes/goes by
Seven months went by before he returned.
month.translation[0].note_box[1].heading: GRAMMAR: Patterns with month
month.translation[0].note_box[1].items[0: Don’t use in with these words
month.translation[0].note_box[1].items[1: Sales fell sharply in last month
month.translation[0].note_box[1].items[2: We’ve been very busy this month
We’ve been very busy in this month
month.translation[0].note_box[1].items[3: It’s my birthday in next month
month.translation[0].note_box[1].items[4: That month I started a new job
In that month I started a new job
month.translation[0].note_box[1].items[5: You use a month when saying how many times in a month something happens
We eat in restaurants several times a month
We eat in restaurants several times in a month
month.translation[0].note_box[1].items[6: You use in the month of when saying the month when something happens
The trees usually flower in the month of May
month.translation[0].note_box[1].items[7: You use all month when talking about something that happens during every part of a month
It’s been raining all the month
